pageProduct.name: Plunkett's Vita E Natural Vitamin E Cream 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Rich non-greasy cream which is based on natural Vitamin E and enriched with Rosehip Oil. For use on face, hands and body.

Plunkett's Vita E Cream contains high strength Vitamin E (100 IU per gram) and is enriched with Rosehip Oil. This non-greasy cream is based on Natural Vitamin E which is more potent than synthetic Vitamin E and makes it easier to absorb. This rich cream moisturises, nourishes and restores skin. Paraben and fragrance free.

Suitable For: Suitable for nourishing, moisturising and restoring dry damaged skin.

Size: 100g

KEY FEATURES

• Vitamin E: helps skin retain natural moisture and eases dryness while antioxidants neutralise damaging free radicals generated by the environment. Softens and smoothes skin by replenishing moisure.
• Rosehip Oil: is rich in Vitamin A & C and essential fatty acids (Omega 3 & 6), helping to improve skin elasticity and suppleness.

Warnings

For external use only. Store below 30°C.

Ingredients

Water, Mineral Oil, Propylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate 100 IU Per Gram (Natural Vitamin E: D-Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate, Dl-Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate), Emulsifying Wax, Cetyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Allantoin, Lanolin, Panthenol, Retinyl Palmitate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol. Does not contain parabens, fragrance or colourings.

Active Ingredients: Natural Vitamin E (100 IU per gram)
Rosehip Oil

Directions

Apply twice daily or as needed. Can be used on face, hands and body.
